about_the_game:
This third-person simulator combinedRebel Galaxy's explosive broadside combat with tense room-based roguelike encounters – where every jump could mean salvaging critical upgrades... or facing catastrophic system failures.

Intense and Strategic Space Combat

Your vessel's loadout, traits, and tactical reflexes will be tested across randomized challenges. Will you prioritize shield capacity or powerful weapons? Sacrifice engine power for more turrets?

Roguelike Elements

Every run is a fresh challenge where you'll unlock unique abilities, customize your warship with upgrades, and ultimately forge a mighty vessel capable of overcoming any threat. Plus, our progression system lets you permanently boost your stats - giving you an increasing edge with each new attempt.

Space Warship Simulation

This isn't dogfighting in some tin-can starfighter – you're commanding capital-class firepower.  Unlock warship classes that redefine combat: refitted battleships enhanced with longrange railgun, or carriers that swarm enemy with drones 

Warship Customization

As the game progresses, you'll unlock more weapons and dreadnought hulls– but true power lies in how you assemble them. Every section you choose, every device installed in engineering bay, defines your combat signature. Will your flagship be a glass cannon bristling with spinal-mounted railguns, or an armored leviathan radiating defensive countermeasures?

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64 bit
  • Processor: Intel core gen 10
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: nVidia GTX 1060
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 10 GB available space

  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64 bit
  • Processor: Intel core I7
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: nVidia GTX 2060

short_description: TheFlagShip is an immersive roguelike space adventure that places you at the helm of a formidable battleship, navigating through a universe filled with danger and discovery. Inspired by the combat gameplay of Rebel Galaxy and with a room-based roguelike encounter system.
